definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 后印象派反映了大量与文学象征主义相似的态度。

sentences.english: The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 赢者的优势全在态度，而不在才智。

sentences.english: Anderson has the attitude for comedy, but not the aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 导演有对于喜剧片的态度，但是也许并不正确。

sentences.english: That should be the attitude that we in the media should strive for.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们这些媒体人应有的正确态度。

sentences.english: She blushed when they criticized her for her incorrect attitude toward labour.
sentences.chinese: 当他们批评她对劳动的不正确态度时，她脸红了。

sentences.english: Scientists have a negative attitude to the theory.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们对这个理论的态度是相当消极的。

sentences.english: The Sagittarius' attitude to love drives Virgo out of his/her mind.
sentences.chinese: 射手座对于爱情的态度会让处女座发疯。

sentences.english: What is the positive attitude towards the nature?
sentences.chinese: 对大自然应抱什么态度？

sentences.english: She also changed attitudes towards women's dress, says Professor Cawthon.
sentences.chinese: 她还改变了人们对于女装的态度，卡森教授说。

sentences.english: So we, with an attitude of pursuing true emotion, seek for love.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们抱着追求真感情的态度，寻找爱情。

sentences.english: There was a significant decrease in the subjects' pretest and post-test scores of attitude and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 学生的英语学习态度和动机前后测分数有显著降低。

sentences.english: Lin Manhung was rushed to answer during the questioning so her attitude seemed a little tough.
sentences.chinese: 由于林满红答询时急于解释，态度略显强硬。

sentences.english: The liberals prefer to sit on the fence while the other parties fight it out.
sentences.chinese: 自由党宁可抱骑墙态度，坐待其他党派去斗争到底。

sentences.english: Independent, enthusiastic, self-initiating, self-motivated & able to perform under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 独立，态度积极，自发与能在压力下执行任务。

sentences.english: He had ranked himself in the numerous phalanx of unbelievers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直象其它无数怀疑者一样持怀疑态度。

sentences.english: She blushed when we criticized he for incorrect attitude to ward labour.
sentences.chinese: 当我们批评她对待劳动的不正确态度时，她脸红了。

definition: attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
words and actions/what one says and what one does
